messages.subject: mothering vs teaching
messages.msgSnippet: To me, mothering is being the best that I can be in every given moment. Dear Mary ......you express yourself so beautifully. That is what I mean by teaching ,
messages.messageBody:
To me,
mothering is being the best that I can be in every
given moment.

Dear Mary ......you express yourself so beautifully.
That is what I mean by "teaching", too. Mothering and
teaching and setting an example have to be synonymous.
Thanks...Sharon
ps......but I hope some of my more unpleasant
characteristics get deleted from my child's learning
acquisitions!! I'm certainly not the best example of
very much at all!! I do try hard, and try to point
myself in the right general direction!! I pray it's
enough.






__________________________________________________
